description: Retrospective application for the external air conditioning condenser unit installed on the front elevation
decision_conditions: The installation of the Air Conditioning Unit would amount to development as defined in the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). The applicant has failed to demonstrate on the grounds of probability that the development would be Permitted Development or would be immune from enforcement action. As such the application is refused.

The applicant is informed that any raised patio more than 30cm above existing ground level requires planning permission and should be included in the description of any future submissions.  Design and specifications should be detailed on the submitted drawings accordingly.

Please provide copy of Existing front elevation and existing roof plan at a recognised scale of 1:50 or 1:100, providing a scale bar, showing all elevations not just part and indicating all key dimensions for the proposed work.Note: The submitted Existing front elevation does not show the front roof lights, whereas the existing roof plan has 2 nos front rooflights. Please revise the drawing accordingly.
